author: Krisztian Sandor
title: Ethereum ETFs See Inflow Surge as BlackRock’s ETHA Draws in Record $300M in a Day
description: Investors are pouring capital into U.S.-listed ether ETFs, helping push the asset's price to $3,000.
content: Ethereum's ether (ETH), the second largest crypto asset, is seeing renewed investor interest, with spot exchange-traded funds (ETFs) in the U.S. recording one of their strongest streak of momentum of… [+1288 chars]
